item.title: By: 5 Startup Tips from Bend Founders, VCs and Serial Entrepreneurs #julieselfie | StartupBend
item.dc:creator: 5 Startup Tips from Bend Founders, VCs and Serial Entrepreneurs #julieselfie | StartupBend
item.description: […] LeadMethod Found and CEO Justin Johnson says, “You’ve got to have a lot of empathy when working with employees, investors, customers, advisors and just about everyone else you work with. They’re in it right along with you. This is not a solo game; you will not have all the answers, and the minute you think you do there is a problem. Be confident, but listen (really listen) to the people working with you, supporting you and those who have been there before. Trust me, your business will go a lot farther and faster if you do.” […]
item.content:encoded: […] LeadMethod Found and CEO Justin Johnson says, “You’ve got to have a lot of empathy when working with employees, investors, customers, advisors and just about everyone else you work with. They’re in it right along with you. This is not a solo game; you will not have all the answers, and the minute you think you do there is a problem. Be confident, but listen (really listen) to the people working with you, supporting you and those who have been there before. Trust me, your business will go a lot farther and faster if you do.” […]
